```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(DT)
require(covid19)
require(dplyr)
require(flexdashboard)
require(highcharter)
require(magrittr)

# Building the COVID19 object
covid <- Covid$new()$update()
```

Summary {.sidebar data-width=275}
=======================================================================

[![](hm_logo.png){.class width=20% height=20%}](https://www.hypermynds.com)

This dashboard represents the outbreak and spread of COVID-19 in **Italy**.

Forecasts are calculated adopting a simple exponential model under the
assumption of **no containment measures**.

Based on data of the last 10 days, the estimated growing factor is equal to
**`r covid$grow_rate('ITA') %>% round(1) %>% format(decimal.mark = ',')`%**,
corresponding to a doubling time of
**`r log(2) %>% divide_by(1e-2 * covid$grow_rate('ITA')) %>% round(1) %>% format(decimal.mark = ',')` days**.

```{r}
selectInput(
  inputId = 'region',
  label = 'Please select a region:',
  choices = c('Italia' = 'ITA', covid$regions()),
  multiple = FALSE,
  selectize = FALSE
)
selectInput(
  inputId = 'log-scale',
  label = 'Please select a scale:',
  choices = list('Linear' = FALSE, 'Logarithmic' = TRUE),
  multiple = FALSE,
  selectize = FALSE
)
```

----

This dashboard is built from data provided by the Civil Protection department
of the Italian Government through the [COVID-19](https://github.com/pcm-dpc/COVID-19)
repository.

The excellent [Highcharts](https://www.highcharts.com) JS library is being used
for the charts.

----

Dashboard
=======================================================================

Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Total Cases {.value-box}

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  total_cases <- covid$get(input[['region']]) %>%
      tail(1) %>% 
      pull(totale_casi) %>%
      format(big.mark = '.', decimal.mark = ',')
  valueBox(
    value = total_cases,
    icon = "fa-users"
  )
})
```

### Recovered {.value-box}

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  recovered <- covid$get(input[['region']]) %>%
      tail(1) %>% 
      pull(dimessi_guariti) %>%
      format(big.mark = '.', decimal.mark = ',')
  valueBox(
    value = recovered,
    icon = "fa-thumbs-up"
  )
})
```

### Deaths {.value-box}

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  deaths <- covid$get(input[['region']]) %>%
      tail(1) %>% 
      pull(deceduti) %>%
      format(big.mark = '.', decimal.mark = ',')
  valueBox(
    value = deaths,
    icon = "fa-times",
    color = 'warning'
  )
})
```

Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Historical Data

```{r}
fillCol(
  height = 600,
  flex = c(NA, 1), 
  inputPanel(
    selectInput(
      inputId = 'is-delta',
      label = 'Please select a metric:',
      choices = list(
        'Cumulative' = FALSE,
        'New Cases Only' = TRUE
      ),
      multiple = FALSE,
      selectize = FALSE
    )
  ),
  renderHighchart({
    covid$plot_hist(
      region = input[['region']],
      log = input[['log-scale']],
      delta = input[['is-delta']]
    )
  })
)
```

### Forecast Analysis

```{r}
fillCol(
  height = 600,
  flex = c(NA, 1), 
  inputPanel(
    selectInput(
      inputId = 'fit-series',
      label = 'Please select a variable:',
      choices = list(
        'Total Cases' = 'totale_casi',
        'Deaths' = 'deceduti'
      ),
      multiple = FALSE,
      selectize = FALSE
    ),
    dateInput(
      inputId = 'fit-date',
      label = 'Please select a fit date:',
      value = max(covid$dates()),
      min = min(covid$dates()),
      max = max(covid$dates()),
      format = 'dd/mm/yyyy',
      weekstart = 1,
      autoclose = TRUE
    )
  ),
  renderHighchart({
    covid$plot_fore2(
      region = input[['region']],
      series = input[['fit-series']],
      fit_date = input[['fit-date']],
      log = input[['log-scale']]
    )
  })
)
```
